articles.title: Handwave lends a hand to retailers with its European alternative to Amazon’s palm payments
articles.description: Latvian startup Handwave aims to compete with Amazon palm payments by offering an independent alternative.
articles.author: Anna Heim

articles.title: Female-founded semiconductor AI startup SixSense raises $8.5M
articles.description: SixSense offers an AI-powered platform that helps chip makers prevent defects. It landed backing led by Peak XV’s Surge (formerly Sequoia India
articles.author: Kate Park
